A sendir command is comprised of:

sendir,<connectorAddress>,<id>,<frequency>,<repeat>,<offset>,<on cycles>,<off cycles>,...<on cycles><large off cycles>

subsequent

<on cycles>,<off cycles>,...<on cycles><large off cycles>

are not necessary e.g.

sendir,1:3,4,36764,1,1,
128,64,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,2738,
128,64,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,2738,
128,64,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,4705

can be reduced to:

sendir,1:3,4,36764,1,1,128,64,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,47,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,15,17,47,17,2738
